page.title: 19SHOPPING IN ROSSINGTON
page.content: There are about 20 shops in the shopping centre. They are open 5\ days a week closing Wednesday afternoon and all day Sunday. There are butchers, 2 supermarkets, 2 chemists, newsagents, furniture store, ironmongers, a dress shop, a paint shop, a florist, 2 post offices, bakers, travel agents, an opticians, 2 hairdressers and 2 shoe shops. There are a few shops scattered around Rossington other than in the main shopping area. A market in Rossington opens on Tuesdays and Fridays. It sells fruit, vegetables, clothes, eggs, toys, wool, fish, shoes, sweets and materials. There is a large supermarket in Rossington which is very popular for the sale of groceries.
